ygData.subject: Re: Advise Needed
ygData.msgSnippet: First, let me say thank you for the responces. I was feeling depressed a while ago, which happens to me every now and then, but I am not clinical. Heh. I guess
ygData.messageBody:
First, let me say thank you for the responces.
I was feeling depressed a while ago, which happens to me
every now and then, but I am not clinical. Heh.

I guess when I look at Cronik, I feel limited in what I
can do. Granted, this is the purpose with a very
powerful class.

I like the powerhouse that he is, but all the zone
crossing and limited bind points are frustrating. I will
figure something out.
Again thanks for your support. :)

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous


>From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
>My first character was a wizard, which I enjoyed playing (and still
do from
>time to time), but I enjoy my SK even more. Granted I can't solo
if I
>wanted to (I'm a DE), or if I did, I'd have massive downtime. I
think it's
>the variation that is appealing. The main reason I don't like playing
the
>wizard much anymore is because I feel like I stand for 1 min, cast,
cast,
>cast, then sit for 5+ minutes medding. At least I can play with
my spell
>book now.
>
>With the SK, I'm the puller generally, so I get to run around and
just do
>more. So I guess that's what I find more appealing.
>
>X.
>
>
>----Original Message Follows----
>From: rich.hitz@...
>
>I am starting to have that itch again. I think I am not
>enjoying my Troll anymore. Since I started playing my
>Druid, I dread getting on as my troll. But I can't put
>my finger on why. I haven't played Cronik in a week or
>so.
>I have /played my Druid for <14 hours and am 2 bubs into
>6th level. I guess I have learned how to level rather
>quickly with my class of choice. This may be slow to
>some, but for me it is astronomically fast.
>I am in the middle of a mental debate on whether or not
>to scrap him, sell everything, run to my druid, die and
>leave him a big inheritance.
>Anyone else run into this problem of character ping-pong?
>Things at home are also very stressed, so that isn't
>helping either.
>Thanks.
>
>--
>Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
>Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
>15th Season Troll SK
>Bertoxxulous
>
